Executive Roundtable

Lifesciences on AWS

Invitation and referral only

August 14 – 15, NYC
Request Invitation

Amazon Web Services Executive Roundtable brings together technical leaders from top AWS Partners to establish deeper relationships with AWS technical teams, get relevant roadmap information, and learn from their peers. Partners will get the opportunity to hear from AWS, explore opportunities for deeper AWS platform integration, and discuss joint third-party solution design, where multiple partner offerings are combined to provide a comprehensive solution.
